name: Photobooth Application
description: A simple photobooth application with vanilla javascript and simple server

name: NBA Memory
description: A memory game that uses React to create a fluid and single page application.

name: Nintendo Trivia
description: A Nintendo trivia game built with JavaScript and jQuery.Designed using Bootstrap and local CSS.

name: Burger App
description: An application that allows users to enter burger related data that is stored in a MySQL database through an Express server. Uses node.js, handlebars, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, CSS and all associated npm packages. Deployed through heroku sites.

name: New York Times Scraper
description: An application that scrapes data from New York Times using Cheerio. The data is then manipulated with user interaction and maintained in a MongoDB.

name: Friend Finder
description: An Express app developed to help pair users with someone who has similar personality traits as them.

name: Gif Collector
description: A site that uses JavaScript, jQuery and AJAX to provide the user with search related Gifs. This application uses local storage to store individual searches and saves searched buttons. Designed using Bootstrap and local CSS.
